attributes.action: force Liam Byrne to resign for applying new, knee jerk criteria to existing Highly Skilled Migrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The suspension of this programme until Dec.5th 2006 after which new criteria will be applied but not just to new applicants, existing ones too! So, after being encouraged to 'make this country their home' they have a month to sell up and pack their bags, if they don't meet the required 75 points. Sorry Bill Gates the doors shut mate!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "force Liam Byrne to resign for applying new, knee jerk criteria to existing Highly Skilled Migrants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11174.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HSMP-Byrne/
